readable.content: Two boys show off their stained , blue tongues . Two boys with wearing baseball caps are sticking out green stained tongues . Two kids are sticking their blue and green colored tongues out . Two young boys wearing collared shirts and baseball caps have their blue-tinted tongues stuck out . Two young boys wearing hats and sticking their colored tongues out .
